source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenic, wide-angle shot from the bow of a large container ship at sea. The camera looks out over stacks of shipping containers towards a dramatic, colorful sky at either sunrise or sunset. The vast ocean stretches to the horizon under a cloudy, pastel-colored sky.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenic, wide-angle shot from the bow of a large container ship at sea. The camera looks out over stacks of shipping containers towards a dramatic, colorful sky at either sunrise or sunset. The vast ocean stretches to the horizon under a cloudy, pastel-colored sky.

generated_critique: The caption fails to describe the motion present in the video, instead focusing on a static description of the scene. The video is a time-lapse shot where the container ship moves forward across the ocean as clouds rapidly drift and evolve across the sky. The caption also includes the speculative phrase "at either sunrise or sunset" and the subjective adjective "dramatic," both of which should be avoided. The description should be revised to focus on the forward movement of the ship and the time-lapsed motion of the clouds.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a time-lapse video from a wide-angle perspective on the bow of a large container ship, showing it moving forward across the open sea. The camera looks out over stacks of shipping containers toward the horizon. Above, clouds rapidly drift and evolve across a sky colored with the pastel pinks, oranges, and blues of a low sun.
